subject: my favorite person in the world
body: i'm thankful that this weekend deborah and i will have been married for eight years. i'm thankful that our relationship is forever getting better, that each day we find new ways to love and appreciate and accept and support each other. i'm thankful that i get to spend my life with my favorite person in the world.
normalized_markdown: i'm thankful that this weekend deborah and i will have been married for eight years. i'm thankful that our relationship is forever getting better, that each day we find new ways to love and appreciate and accept and support each other. i'm thankful that i get to spend my life with my favorite person in the world.
